```
`$ pdfxmeta -a 1 -p page in.pdf "Section" >> recipe.toml
$ pdfxmeta -a 2 -p page in.pdf "Subsection" >> recipe.toml` 
```

```
`$ pdftocgen in.pdf < recipe.toml | pdftocio -o out.pdf in.pdf` 
```

```
`$ pdftocgen in.pdf < recipe.toml > toc
$ vim toc # edit
$ pdftocio in.pdf < toc` 
```

